
Layout of MUSL thread pages
===========================

```
        +--------------------+ <- map (size)
        | guard              |
        +--------------------+ <- stack limit
        | stack              |
        +--------------------+ <- stack
        | args               |
        +--------------------+
        | tls [ dtv | self ] |
        +--------------------+
        | tsd                |
        +--------------------+
```
